t: Check out this Amazon review of Logitech MK570 Wireless Wave Keyboard and Mouse Combo, Black
s: It's ergonomically shaped and has a scrolling wheel and button. So, if you have a keyboard tray with the room for it and a mouse, this is the all-in-one to buy. But note, the mouse doesn't come with a separate pad, so you have to buy one.
